control.visible: [[$EXP[ShowcaseView_IsVisible] | $EXP[StripView_IsVisible]] + [ListItem($PARAM[position]).IsPlaying | [Container.Content(tvshows) + String.IsEqual(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle,ListItem($PARAM[position]).Title)] | [Container.Content(seasons) + String.IsEqual(VideoPlayer.TVShowTitle,ListItem($PARAM[position]).TVShowTitle) + String.IsEqual(VideoPlayer.Season,ListItem($PARAM[position]).Season)] | [Container.Content(artists) + String.IsEqual(MusicPlayer.Artist, ListItem($PARAM[position]).Artist)] | [Container.Content(albums) + String.IsEqual(MusicPlayer.Artist, ListItem($PARAM[position]).Artist) + String.IsEqual(MusicPlayer.Album, ListItem($PARAM[position]).Album)]]] | $EXP[StandardViews_NowPlaying]
